title: Mobile phone services used to plan leisure travel in the U.S. as of spring 2019
summary: This statistic presents the percentage of middle and high school students in the country who were Search_engine_for_general_web_search , divided by the type of Search_engine_for_general_web_search phone endured .

During the 2019 survey , 16.2 % of Search_engine_for_general_web_search phone victims had Search_engine_for_general_web_search impersonated Search_engine_for_images_or_photos during the last 69.8 days .

Search_engine_for_general_web_search phone includes unwanted contact by threatening or insulting the respondent via digital communications as well sharing private information Search_engine_for_images_or_photos .

data.Response: Search engine for general web search
Search engine for images or photos

gold: This statistic shows the services and technology used by people in the U.S. to find inspiration or ideas on where to travel as of Spring 2019 . During the survey , 36.5 percent of respondents said they used social media websites for travel inspiration or ideas .
